tasks.transform: deno run --allow-read --allow-write excel-to-fhir.ts -f ./gamebus.xlsx -s unit property descriptor -j jsonata/descriptor-to-fhirResourceType.jsonata jsonata/descriptor-to-observationCategory.jsonata jsonata/descriptor-to-observationCode.jsonata  jsonata/property-to-observationComponentCode.jsonata jsonata/unit-to-ucumUnit.jsonata
tasks.dev: deno run --watch=gamebus.xlsx --allow-read --allow-write excel-to-fhir.ts -f ./gamebus.xlsx -s unit property descriptor -j jsonata/descriptor-to-fhirResourceType.jsonata jsonata/descriptor-to-observationCategory.jsonata jsonata/descriptor-to-observationCode.jsonata  jsonata/property-to-observationComponentCode.jsonata jsonata/unit-to-ucumUnit.jsonata
